rss.channel:
医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
迷幻药的阴暗面：新模型揭示了错误见解和信念的风险研究人员引入 FIBUS 模型来解释迷幻药如何导致错误的见解和信念，强调需要进行仔细的临床评估以优化治疗结果。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240804/Psychedelics-dark-side-New-model-reveals-risks-of-false-insights-and-beliefs.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240804/Psychedelics-dark-side-New-model-reveals-risks-of-false-insights-and-beliefs.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9e03cd82-25a9-4d5e-a046-aab46945bc3e Sun, 04 Aug 2024 23:47:00 -0400 Psychedelics' dark side: New model reveals risks of false insights and beliefs
糖尿病会使严重的长期疾病的发作加速 15-20 年，从而缩短预期寿命《自然医学》杂志上的一项研究表明，糖尿病会使多种长期疾病的发病加速 15-20 年，从而显着缩短英国成年人的预期寿命。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240804/Diabetes-accelerates-the-onset-of-severe-long-term-conditions-by-15-20-years-cutting-life-expectancy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240804/Diabetes-accelerates-the-onset-of-severe-long-term-conditions-by-15-20-years-cutting-life-expectancy.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1f90df69-6bf8-49f5-9ca3-73fe56888dfa Sun, 04 Aug 2024 23:27:00 -0400 Diabetes accelerates the onset of severe long-term conditions by 15-20 years, cutting life expectancy
年轻一代癌症发病率上升表明迫切需要早期预防策略《柳叶刀公共卫生》的一项研究显示，美国年轻出生群体的癌症发病率和死亡率不断上升，表明生命早期致癌物质暴露的增加。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240804/Rising-cancer-rates-in-younger- Generations-signal-urgent-need-for-early-life-prevention-strategies.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240804/Rising-cancer-rates-in-younger- Generations-signal-urgent-need-for-early-life-prevention-strategies.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=31bf2512-ea8c-4870-ac55-73743b4e842d Sun, 04 Aug 2024 23:02:00 -0400 Rising cancer rates in younger generations signal urgent need for early-life prevention strategies
德克萨斯州奶牛和牛奶中发现 H5N1 禽流感，引发对感染漏报的担忧UTMB 的研究人员在德克萨斯州的奶牛和牛奶中发现了 H5N1 禽流感病毒，这凸显了农场工人感染情况可能存在漏报的情况，以及加强监测的必要性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240804/H5N1-avian-flu-found-in-Texas-dairy-cattle-and-milk-sparking-concerns-about-underreported-infections.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240804/H5N1-avian-flu-found-in-Texas-dairy-cattle-and-milk-sparking-concerns-about-underreported-infections.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f15cdbc5-7410-492a-b0a3-c43b1c21d94d Sun, 04 Aug 2024 22:34:00 -0400 H5N1 avian flu found in Texas dairy cattle and milk, sparking concerns about underreported infections
在大脑的颅骨骨髓中发现活性免疫细胞对抗胶质母细胞瘤一项研究揭示了胶质母细胞瘤中免疫细胞的存在和活性，揭示了对脑肿瘤免疫学和潜在治疗途径的新见解。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240804/Active-immune-cells-discovered-in-brains-cranial-bone-marrow-fighting-glioblastomas.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240804/Active-immune-cells-discovered-in-brains-cranial-bone-marrow-fighting-glioblastomas.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a205bf10-ff9d-4a2e-9cd1-cf53da3d9df2 Sun, 04 Aug 2024 22:11:00 -0400 Active immune cells discovered in brain's cranial bone marrow fighting glioblastomas
美国可可产品中重金属含量令人震惊一项研究发现，美国许多可可产品的镉和铅含量超过安全限值，这凸显了加强食品监测的必要性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240804/Alarming-heavy-metal-levels-found-in-US-cocoa-products.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240804/Alarming-heavy-metal-levels-found-in-US-cocoa-products.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f0244b7f-2a39-40f2-b258-36c0b367fa11 Sun, 04 Aug 2024 22:01:00 -0400 Alarming heavy metal levels found in US cocoa products
研究证实英格兰数百万成年人接种 COVID-19 疫苗的心血管安全性一项研究证实了不同剂量的 COVID-19 疫苗的心血管安全性，表明接种疫苗的英格兰成年人常见心血管事件的风险降低。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240804/Study-confirms-cardioangio-safety-of-COVID-19-vaccines-among-millions-of-adults-in-England.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240804/Study-confirms-cardioangio-safety-of-COVID-19-vaccines-among-millions-of-adults-in-England.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=adb27259-eebc-4bff-9b70-b44505a2beb4 Sun, 04 Aug 2024 21:53:00 -0400 Study confirms cardiovascular safety of COVID-19 vaccines among millions of adults in England
研究揭示室内壁炉对南非家庭空气质量的隐患一项研究显示，使用室内壁炉的南非家庭的颗粒物 (PM2.5) 水平较高，其暴露与室外温度较低有关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240804/Study-exposes-hidden-dangers-of-indoor-fireplaces-on-air-quality-in-South-African-homes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240804/Study-exposes-hidden-dangers-of-indoor-fireplaces-on-air-quality-in-South-African-homes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=106e6a13-ef94-4efd-b9d4-0b04cbe36e0d Sun, 04 Aug 2024 21:42:00 -0400 Study exposes hidden dangers of indoor fireplaces on air quality in South African homes
行为干预减少分心驾驶，促进道路安全《美国国家科学院院刊》上的一项研究表明，行为干预和经济激励措施可以通过限制手持手机的使用来有效减少分心驾驶。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240804/Behavioral-interventions-reduce-distracted-driven-promoting-safer-roads.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240804/Behavioral-interventions-reduce-distracted-driven-promoting-safer-roads.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a35f9746-8f79-4f57-a636-d00d6a0d6e6f Sun, 04 Aug 2024 21:27:00 -0400 Behavioral interventions reduce distracted driving, promoting safer roads
新的人工智能方法可以根据激素水平准确预测男性不育症，无需进行精液分析研究调查了基于血清激素水平的男性不育症人工智能筛查方法的准确性，为传统精液分析提供了一种非侵入性替代方案。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240804/New-AI-method-accurately-predicts-male-infertility-from-hormone-levels-bypassing-need-for-semen-analysis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240804/New-AI-method-accurately-predicts-male-infertility-from-hormone-levels-bypassing-need-for-semen-analysis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5773c2a7-47ca-4b58-aed5-662cdafda131 Sun, 04 Aug 2024 21:16:00 -0400 New AI method accurately predicts male infertility from hormone levels, bypassing need for semen analysis
